name: Within the Woods
description:
Within the Woods is a platformer about a racoon lost in the woods. The racoon soon finds that there are other creatures occupying the forest, creatures that thirst for his blood.

If you like the Webgl version, we recommend playing the Windows / Mac build, as they have much better framerates. If you experience some frame drops on Webgl, one solution is to enable hardware acceleration on your browser if you haven't already.  

This is a submission to Weekly Game Jam 188, where you have 6 days to make a game. The theme is "Treehouse". We made a game loosely based on the Baba Yaga, a Slavic folktale about a demon tree house with chicken legs.

Attributions

For fonts, we use Silver, one of my favorite. The palette is 24-universal by Danilo Recevic. The sound effects and music were from opengameart, freesound, and Youtube's audio library..

The pixel art was made in Aseprite by Valkoy (who also did lighting). The particle effects and programming was made in Unity by Thuleanx.
